name: Vegas Robaina - 2008 Edicion Regional - Petit Robusto - Exclusivo Portugal
additionalNotes:
The Robaina family has farmed tobacco continuously since 1845 on their precious vegas (fields) at Cuchillas de Barbacoa situated in the San Luis zone of the Vuelta Abajo tobacco region. Vegas Robaina cigars were introduced in 1997 as a tribute to the legendary ability of the family's patriarch Don Alejandro
